comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: The gentleman behind and to Edison's right appears to be Josephus Daniels, then Secretary of the Navy. See www.patriotspoint.org/news_events/josephus-daniels-and-na... , which alludes to a tour of the Brooklyn Naval Yard by Edison and Daniels in October 1914. (Mysteriously, their picture of the event has been removed -- is there some conspiracy here?) I'd guess that's Mrs. Edison who has Thomas by his left arm.
